long_description: Be sure to carry this magnesium fire-starting tool wherever you roam. It can can start hundreds of fires. From the block, just scrape off magnesium shavings with a knife, then scrape the sparking insert rapidly next to the shavings to ignite. Works wet or dry, and can even ignite damp kindling. Magnesium fire-starting tool is fireproof in solid form.
